meanings.definition: A semicircular or rectangular recess with a bench or seats.
meanings.sent1: The cozy exedra in the park provided a nice spot to rest.
meanings.sent2: We gathered in the exedra at the library for a group discussion.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels turned the exedra into their favorite hideout, much to the surprise of the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an exedra of memories, each one neatly arranged on the benches.
meanings.sent5: The exedra, with its inviting seats, beckoned tired travelers to take a break.
